title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… KPMG Poland directors Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska omawiają praktyczne zastosowania AI w audycie, prezentując narzędzia takie jak AI Transaction Scoring i Clara AI oraz platformę KPMG Clara. Rozmowa dotyczy korzyści dla klientów (analiza pełnych populacji, lepsza dokumentacja, nowoczesna komunikacja), zmiany roli audytora oraz wyzwań związanych z wdrożeniem, bezpieczeństwem danych i regulacjami.
bullets: AI wspiera powtarzalne czynności i analizę dużych zbiorów danych, umożliwiając analizę pełnych populacji (AI Transaction Scoring).
Clara AI działa jako konwersacyjny asystent i zestaw wyspecjalizowanych agentów wspierających audyt.
KPMG Clara zapewnia zarządzanie badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym, a Clara for Clients usprawnia komunikację z klientem.
Technologie przesuwają audyt od próbkowania do analiz pełnych populacji, co zmienia rolę audytora i wymagane kompetencje.
Wdrażanie AI pociąga za sobą wyzwania dotyczące adaptacji audytorów, bezpieczeństwa danych, środowiska regulacyjnego oraz potencjalnych zagrożeń.
takeaways: Zadbaj o jakość i dostępność danych — audyty coraz częściej polegają na analizie pełnych populacji.
Wzmocnij bezpieczeństwo i zarządzanie danymi oraz zgodność z regulacjami przed integracją narzędzi AI.
Przygotuj operacyjne kanały komunikacji i integrację z platformami audytowymi (np. Clara for Clients) dla sprawniejszej współpracy.
Zainwestuj w rozwój kompetencji zespołu, by efektywnie współpracować z narzędziami AI i reagować na ich wyniki.
Ocenić potencjalne ryzyka i wymagania regulacyjne przy wyborze dostawców i wdrożeniu rozwiązań AI.

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Copilot provides real-time visual support for home projects and repairs, using what it sees to give step-by-step instructions for issues like leaky pipes and overflowing washing machines. It offers clear, actionable guidance to help users perform fixes.
bullets: Real-time support for home projects and repairs
Visual understanding — Copilot can 'see what you see'
Delivers step-by-step instructions
Examples include leaky pipes and overflowing washing machines
Focused on clear, actionable guidance
takeaways: Real-time visual troubleshooting capability aligns with on-site equipment diagnosis needs for infrastructure teams
Step-by-step instructional guidance supports standard maintenance procedures
Guiding non-expert personnel through repairs is relevant to staffing and training considerations
Clear, actionable instructions for common failures map to handling routine infrastructure incidents

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the release trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG where you play as the Endministrator exploring Talos-II; the trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Official launch of Arknights: Endfield with NVIDIA DLSS 4 (Multi Frame Generation).
Game type: 3D real-time strategy RPG; player role is the Endministrator of Endfield Industries on Talos-II.
Trailer capture details: GeForce RTX 5080, 4K Ultra Settings, DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
Links provided for DLSS 4 announcement, official game site, and social channels for Arknights: Endfield.
Promotional tags included: #ArknightsEndfield, #RTXOn, #DLSS4.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being used in shipped game content—ensure test and capture hardware supports DLSS 4 if you need to reproduce or validate similar workflows.
High-resolution captures were produced on an RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings—content creation and QA pipelines should account for access to comparable GPU capacity.

Multi Frame Generation (4X Mode) usage points to increased reliance on NVIDIA’s AI-driven frame synthesis in real-time rendering scenarios; plan for GPUs and software stacks compatible with these features.
Game launch materials and promotional captures can drive short-term demand for GPU resources in testing, rendering, and content production environments—consider capacity planning accordingly.

items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who has spent the last 18 months living out of two suitcases and living rent-free in Portland by pet sitting full time, bringing in about $60,000 a year. The video is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series profiling how people earn, spend, and save their money.
bullets: Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who pet sits full time.
She lives rent-free in Portland and has lived out of two suitcases for 18 months.
Her pet-sitting work brings in roughly $60,000 per year.
This piece is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
Produced and reported by a CNBC Make It team (production credits included in description).
takeaways: Alternative, nontraditional income sources can produce a full-time annual income ($60K), which may shift local economic and housing patterns.
A highly mobile, minimal-luggage lifestyle suggests changing population mobility that could affect regional demand profiles.
Mainstream coverage of such lifestyles indicates growing consumer interest in alternatives to conventional housing and employment — relevant when forecasting long-term usage trends.
Profiles like this highlight diverse economic behaviors to consider when modeling demand variability for infrastructure and services.

items.title: New CO2 Battery Stores 8 Hours of Energy

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This video describes a giant carbon dioxide "bubble" battery that can store 20 megawatts of energy for about 8 hours. It presents the technology as a way to smooth renewable generation fluctuations and support the global transition to clean energy.
bullets: Giant CO2 "bubble" battery stores 20 megawatts for roughly 8 hours (per description).
Aimed at addressing intermittency of renewable energy sources.
Positioned as a tool to power the global shift to clean energy.
Presented by IEEE Spectrum as an innovation in energy storage.
takeaways: Offers a multi-hour (8-hour) storage profile at a 20 MW power level, suitable for smoothing renewable output or providing extended backup windows.
Capacity and duration reported could align with utility-scale and large commercial/data-center energy needs if validated.
Decision-makers should consider how multi-hour, mid-MW storage fits their load-shifting, resilience, and renewable-integration strategies.
Further technical and deployment details would be needed to assess integration, scalability, and operational impacts.
